website_summaries.verdict: Not only will it keep your phone protected, but the design won't rub off as it's printed on the inside.
pros: It's lightweight but sturdy and the bumper keeps it protected
cons: Up close the design can look cheap, and it can get dirty with wear and tear

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most durable case I've ever had that I also actually like! It's so cute! I bought a glass screen protector to use along with it and I honestly feel like my phone is pretty protected. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Wells

customer_reviews.title: Nice case.
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone case. My only problem with it is that the flowers are not as pigmented as they are presented to be in the photo. They are faded severly pixelated and not the dark red that I wanted when purchasing the case. Aside from that, the case is nicely weighted and raised on the sides for added protection. Would recommend for anyone looking for cheap protection.
customer_reviews.author: Meme Stark

customer_reviews.title: Phone case arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for this case based on the positive reviews, however, I never even got to use the case since it arrived with a crack across the top of it. I think that if it is not strong enough to withstand shipping in a bubble envelope, it probably won’t protect my phone. The only place with the extra bulk are the corners. The rest of the case body was is thin. I’m returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: This case is very pretty but it has also provided great protection
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I first opened the package because I normally use an Otterbox case for my phones. I have been pleasantly surprised! This case is very pretty but it has also provided great protection! I dropped the phone once while standing in line at Disney World and had no issues. It's very sleek, not bulky like some other cases. I would definitely order another one of these cases!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Krchak

customer_reviews.title: This case is so beautiful.!
customer_reviews.text: This case is so beautiful.!! It's not a cheep plastic., and it does not look cheep.! I been having it for a couple of months and it turn like a brown, yellow color, but on my iPhone you can't tell since it's gold, I don't mind, but that's me. I do recommend this case.! Love it.!! 😍😍...!
customer_reviews.author: Ggg..

customer_reviews.title: Pretty perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover. It's so adorable. I have a black iPhone 7 plus and it looks so good on it. Of course the case is clear besides the design on it. I have dropped my phone a couple times and it has saved it. I haven't dropped it hard but I imagine if I did it would help a little. If you are wondering if you should get it, GET IT! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordin Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case to protect my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: The case fits perfectly and I feel that my phone is well protected. I took off one star b/c I think my phone is TOO protected. I've missed many calls and text messages because the corners absorb the vibration when the phone is on silent. LOL. I have to lay my phone on something so that it can make a noise when I have my phone on silent at work. Other than that I would definitely recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Case
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn’t give it a full 5 stars is because it does stain and get cloudy after a long while of use. But I loved it! It was really cute and really sturdy! I trusted my phone with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ancora89

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful for shock protection. I have a red iPhone 8 Plus and it matches so well. Don’t have to compromise looks for function! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: The case is super beautiful and feel solid in my hands. I have yet to drop the phone (knock on wood!) so I'll try not to test its protection anytime soon. Haha. Thanks for the quick delivery, too!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Not only does it look very cute it protects my phone very well. I already dropped my iPhone with this case and it just bounced. The case wasn't scratched not broken. I think I will buy another case from here :)
customer_reviews.author: Olympia B.

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and well made phone case
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and well made phone case. I get co implemented on it on the daily! I recommend purchasing it and I will be making additional purchases from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley V.

customer_reviews.title: This is by far her favorite case which she also took with her when she ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter purchased 5 new cases in anticipation of getting her new IPhone 7Plus which she saved her own money to buy. This is by far her favorite case which she also took with her when she purchased her phone. Case fits perfectly and came really fast which is normally the case when one has Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Kimya

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Case!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case a couple of weeks ago and it is wonderful! Lightweight while still being durable, it provided my phone with the perfect amount of protection and style. Initially, I was worried that the rose decal would scratch or rub off; however, the design is printed inside the case so your phone rests directly against it and prevents chances of damage to the overall look. I really recommend this case to anyone who is looking for something cute and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Pretty case
customer_reviews.text: If you’re into flowers I’ll buy! But for the price mhmm I would pay $3. It’s nice if you want just something nice but you can find something much better for a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Favorite case out of the several I've bought (from multiple brands)
customer_reviews.text: I feel the print quality could be a little better, but overall it is protective, crystal clear, and the bumpers actually look great! No sharp edges that usually happen with cheap cases, and the buttons on my phone are still easy to press. Will repurchase when it gets dirty!
customer_reviews.author: Tawnie

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! It's pretty, easy to put on, and I think it will be good protection. I love that the design is on the INSIDE of the case so I won't have to worry about the design fading.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I haven't had the case (or the phone ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I haven't had the case (or the phone for that matter) very long but it's been dropped a few times and the phone has held up well. Looks good over my matte black iPhone 7.

customer_reviews.title: Pefect protection

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Case!

Its not slippery in your hand and doesn't scratch up. It looks so good on my rose gold iPhone seven plus! I am VERY happy with this purchase!

I'm am also happy that it looks just like the picture and that the flowers do not look pixelated.

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a lifelong LifeProof case girl but I loved the pretty print on this
customer_reviews.text: I am a lifelong LifeProof case girl but I loved the pretty print on this. So, I gave it a try and I’m glad I did! It’s thin but offers great protection with the bumper around the edges and the camera. Definitely get a screen protector though.
customer_reviews.author: ThePez

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to expensive brands

I bought it to replace a $45 Sonix case that came apart and the quality of this $9 case feels and looks just as nice, if not better.

customer_reviews.title: Great case! I got it for my wife as ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case! I got it for my wife as a small present and she absolutely loved it. It looks very nice on the back of an iPhone and feels very sleek in the hand. Seems like a very sturdy case as well. It's not otterbox if you are looking for pretection, but if you want an inexpensive "cute" phone case, go for it

product_meta.title: Cutebe Shockproof Hard PC+ TPU Bumper Case Scratch-Resistant Cover for Apple iPhone 7 Plus(2016)/iPhone 8 Plus(2017) Rose Flower
product_meta.description:
Describtion: 
This fabulous case is the perfect combination of superior protection and smart design. Characterized by shock resistance, buffer function and durable service, this case for your cell phone is made of high quality material which can offer dependable protection for your cell phone of daily life, so that it can ensure the longevity of your cell phone. Furthermore, with fine craftsmanship, this case boasts beautiful appearance and sturdy composition, which can make your cell phone outstanding and distinctive.

Package included: 
1 x Protective Case for iPhone 7 Plus/iPhone 8 Plus (cellphone is NOT included.)
feature_bullets: Specially designed for iPhone 7 Plus/iPhone 8 Plus, Not fit for any other device.£¨The Case did not come with Screen Protector£
Slim fit, does not make your phone look bulky; Protects your device from scratches, bumps, and dings.
Smart design, gives you total access to every functionality and all buttons without removing
Hybrid Design, reserve the pure and the best feeling of holding your phone.
Durable and Eco-Friendly,Made of high quality environmental friendly material that is scentless and harmless to your health.
